name: Rubble Trouble
description:
Rubble Trouble is a commission for the Palette jam 2 [8 Bits to Infinity].

Help the little robot to dive into the mountain!
Go deeper and deeper facing bigger troubles.
Use the bomb provided by the bomb squad to destroy the rubbles and survive until the end of the demolition operation!

[Programming]

TheLameBrain

[Design]

Nekobro

[Audio]

Mr. Boss-inator

[Art]

PolyB
